EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.New York Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Monday at SpringOne Tour!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you Monday at SpringOne Tour NYC <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/nyc?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-nyc-q318]]>. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at springonetour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springonetour@pivotal.io]]> with any questions. Please be sure to bring your government-issued ID, like a driver's license, with you when you check in.

Reactive Spring with Spring Boot 2.0

Social & Networking at Treadwell Park <[[http://treadwellpark.com/downtown/]]>

Location Condé Nast Venues by Convene <[[https://convene.com/location/conde-nast-venues/]]> 1 World Trade Center <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1+World+Trade+Center+34th+Floor,+New+York,+NY+10006/@40.7121334,-74.015492,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89c25a1989a94aeb:0xae4cae7c5efe8afb!8m2!3d40.7121334!4d-74.0133033]]> 34th Floor <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1+World+Trade+Center+34th+Floor,+New+York,+NY+10006/@40.7121334,-74.015492,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89c25a1989a94aeb:0xae4cae7c5efe8afb!8m2!3d40.7121334!4d-74.0133033]]> New York, NY 10007 <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1+World+Trade+Center+34th+Floor,+New+York,+NY+10006/@40.7121334,-74.015492,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89c25a1989a94aeb:0xae4cae7c5efe8afb!8m2!3d40.7121334!4d-74.0133033]]>
Parking Info:
- ICON: 21 Barclay St - Central Parking at Hotel Millenium: 47 Church St - SP Parking: 75 Park Pl - ICON: 200 Murray St
We look forward to seeing you on Monday! Tasha Isenberg and the SpringOne Tour Team
